name: Facility Design Layout Report Date
title: FDLRD
definition: Identifies the date that the trunk facility DLR is to be forwarded to the customer for the digital interface (s) identified in the FCKT field.

validEntry.description: Two Digit Month (01-12) Two Digit Century (00-99)
Two Digit Day (01-31) Two Digit Year (00-99)
Two Digit Century (00-99) Two Digit Month (01-12)
Two Digit Year (00-99) Two Digit Day (01-31)

usageNotes: Required when the ACT field on the ASR Form is “N”, the FCKT field is populated and the RT field is “F”.
Prohibited when the RT field is “B” or “S”.
